reference.title: steptroubleshooting
reference.shortdesc: The <steptroubleshooting> element provides a place for a troubleshooting statement in a task step or substep, following the stepresult. This troubleshooting statement is to help the reader resolve any problems that may arise should their step result not match the result stated in the <stepresult> section of the step.

section.title: Contains
section.p: The content model of this element may differ based on where it is used. Content model information is located here:

section.title: Contained By
section.p: The parents of this element may differ based on where it is used. Content model information is located here:

example.title: Example
example.pre: <step> <cmd>Select <uicontrol>Perform system backup</uicontrol></cmd> <stepresult>The message <systemoutput>Backup successfully completed</systemoutput> displays.</stepresult> <steptroubleshooting>If an eror message displays during the system backup, locate the error ID in the <cite>Troubleshooting Guide</cite> and follow the instructions there.</steptroubleshooting> </step>
